## Types of changes
<!--- What types of changes does your code introduce? Put an `x` in all the boxes that apply: -->
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] API change (syntax or semantics!)
- [ ] DevOps stuff
- [ ] Release

## API compatibility and documentation
<!--- Go over all the following points, and put an `x` in all the boxes that apply. -->
- [ ] API change
  - [ ] [Compatible](https://opensource.zalando.com/restful-api-guidelines/#compatibility)
  - [ ] Incompatible --> new version or new API must be introduced!
- [ ] New API added
- [ ] Existing API deprecated --> start [deprecation process](https://opensource.zalando.com/restful-api-guidelines/#deprecation)
- [ ] Existing API removed --> only possible at the end of [deprecation process](https://opensource.zalando.com/restful-api-guidelines/#deprecation)
- [ ] All API changes documented (CHANGELOG.md)

## Checklist
<!--- Go over all the following points, and put an `x` in all the boxes that apply. -->
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated ([keep-a-changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/))
- [ ] Tests added to cover all changes
- [ ] Architecture change --> document in [dev-docs](https://github.com/gesundheitscloud/dev-docs)
